```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```


```{r}
bladder.pvals = fread("../code/results/leafcutterMD/GTEx/Bladder/outlier_pVals.txt")
```
```{r}
head(bladder.pvals)
```

```{r}
bladder.keep = select(bladder.pvals, -V1) %>% 
  apply(1, min) %>% `<`(.001) %>% which
bladder.pvals[bladder.keep]

```
